"pathwena rajayath samaga salasma wenas wenawanam, ehenam ee salasme yamkisi adupaduwak thiyenawa, yam rajayak theripathwunoth wipakshayata ho an siyalu denata wagakimak thiyenawa salasuma honda nam eeka kadakappal karanne nathuwa eekata honda deyak ekathu karala ee gamanata sambandha wenna oone" "wiwechanaya karanna puluwan, karunu sahithawa wiruddha wenna puluwan, namuth kalen kaleta awurudu pahen pahata dan dakma salasuma wenas wenawanam man hithanne eeka ratata honda deyak neweyi" kisiwaku balayata paminiyada rata godagatha nohaki yayi janathawa athara athi mathaya pilibanda kala wmasimata pilithuru dun kumar sangakkara kiya sitiye "kalinawu, digu deshapalana dakmak thiyena, harihaman awabodhayak thiyena kenekta ho kandayamata ho rajayakata eede wenaskarala shri lankawa aluth athakata geniyanna puluwan kiyana eka mata wishwasayak thiyenawa, eeka mata thiyena danuma gambauru madi karanne kohomada karanne kiyana eka, namuth shri lankikayan merata, pitarata innawa oona tharam sudusakam thiyena ee dakma thiyena" yanuweni.
dan pashchath nuthanawadin jathikawadayata wiruddha wana wita owun yali peni sitinne prabuddhathwa wyapruthiya wenuwenda nathnam minisa saha samajaya pilibanda nawa pashchath darshanayakatada?
